How can I stop Gruulkar?
How can I stop Gruulkar?
How can I stop Gruulkar?
How can I stop Gruulkar?
To stop Gruulkar, you must BE Gruulkar.
To stop Gruulkar, you must BE Gruulkar.

What's that supposed to mean? I need to dress up as an Orc or something?

What's that supposed to mean? I need to dress up as an Orc or something?
No. After the Orcs have been called to war, only the Great Orc can call them back. To send them home, you must prove yourself mightier than Gruulkar and order them home.
